origination.corpname: University of Michigan. Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations.

did.unittitle: Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations (University of Michigan) records 1925-2006 1989-1999
did.abstract: Records of unit responsible for facilities management and regulatory compliance at the University of Michigan. Includes minutes, correspondence, reports, proposals, and archived websites.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: Donated by the Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations (Donor no. 10706), in January, 2012.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records expected.

accessrestrict.p: University records are public records and once fully processed are generally open to research use. Records that contain personally identifiable information will be restricted in order to protect individual privacy. Certain administrative records are restricted in accordance with university policy as outlined below. The restriction of university records is subject to compliance with applicable laws, including the Freedom of Information Act.

The Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations record group includes restricted material in the following categories:
Executive Officers Records -- Boxes 1-17

Executive records (including University records generated by Executive Officers, Deans, Directors and their support offices) are restricted for a period of twenty years from their date of accession by the Bentley Historical Library. The restriction is subject to applicable law, most notably the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA).

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations (University of Michigan) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The University of Michigan Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations reports to the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer is responsible for managing the university's physical properties, including academic, research, and clinical facilities, as well as environmental stewardship and regulatory compliance. The unit was previously named the Office of the Associate Vice President for Business Operations. In 1970, it had the following units under it: Plant Extension, Plant Manager, Personnel Director, Purchasing Director, Safety Director, and Utilities Manager. In 1999, the name was changed to Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations with Henry Baier serving as Associate Vice President. As of 2014, subordinate departments include Architecture, Engineering, and Construction; Parking and Transportation Services; Plant Operations; Occupational Safety and Environmental Health; and Office of Campus Sustainability.

scopecontent.p: The records of the Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations are contained in two series, Topical and Archived Website.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan. Office of the Associate Vice President for Facilities and Operations.

scopecontent.p: The Topical series documents the management of university facilities and property, primarily during the 1990s. It is arranged as it arrived upon accession, essentially alphabetically by facility, topic, or unit. Records in this series include committee minutes, correspondence, aerial photographs, architectural drawings, financial reports, design and construction proposals, budget proposals, contracts, risk management assessments, inspection and test results, etc.

did.unittitle: Dana Building: Phase II Renovation Project 1996-1999
East Ann Arbor Health and Geriatrics Center 1999
Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Building 1999
Naval Architecture and Marine Engineering Building 1970-1996
Presidents Council, State Universities of Michigan 1992-1999
Campus Safety and Security Advisory Committee 1985-1999
Task Force on Campus Safety and Security 1990-1997
Senate Advisory Committee on University Affairs 1986-1999
University of Michigan Transportation Research Institute 1996-1999

scopecontent.p: The Archived Website series includes captures of the Facilities and Operations website and contains information about the unit's structure and responsibilities, guidelines for using facilities, and links to the websites of its subordinate departments. The series includes content captured by the Internet Archive starting in 2005. Since 2010, this archived website has been captured on a regular, ongoing basis as part of the University of Michigan Web Archives, hosted at http://webarchives.cdlib.org/a/universityofmichigan/.

odd.p: (These versions were preserved by the Internet Archive and are made available through its Wayback Machine. The Bentley Historical Library is not involved in the collection or maintenance of this material.)
